data.question: What is the empirical formula of the compound [Zn2(DE-bdc)2(dabco)]n?

How many electrons were calculated in the void space per unit cell for [Zn2(BPy-bdc)2(dabco)]n?
What is the volume of the unit cell for [Zn2(DB-bdc)2(dabco)]n?
Is the dabco pillar in [Zn2(2,5-BME-bdc)2(dabco)]n ordered or disordered?
Does [Zn2(2,3-BME-bdc)2(dabco)]n exhibit a breathing behavior?
Is the BET surface area of {1x61-x}dry (x = 0.50) close to 0 m2g-1?
What is the phase transition pressure of {10.2560.75}dry?
Can N2 penetrate into the narrow pored structures of the MOFs?
What is the free energy difference ΔFhost between the np and lp forms of {10.5060.50}dry?
Is the crystal system of [Zn2(2,5-BME-bdc)2(dabco)]n monoclinic?
What is the reason for the negligible adsorption of N2 in most MOFs?
data.answer: N2 can hardly penetrate into the narrow pored structures.
